Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Ed the Sewing Man
Reviews.Content: Not sure how to be real colorful in the description of this cable - it works and is reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: Jerry G.
Reviews.Content: What can I say, other than "it worked", However, when using it as an extension to an existing cable, you will need to purchase a Male adapter. I found one quickly at Radio Shack.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive cable for power and video to camera.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Comaty
Reviews.Content: The price is right for the quality.  It does not have a thick jacket, so this cable should only be used in a permanent install where the cable will not be subject to abuse.  The connectors are well made.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: A. Zimmerman "amyz713"
Reviews.Content: When my husband put a staple though our security system cord we needed a new one and didn't want to spend a lot. Got this for a bargain and it works great. Just like the ones that came with the system!

Reviews.Title: Good choice but be careful when you unroll it
Reviews.Author: Real Buyer
Reviews.Content: Find out how it rolled before you unroll it, or you might take some time to lay it out in your planned route.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cables for home security system
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "David P McIntosh, Sr."
Reviews.Content: This cable was surprisingly well-made and serves its intended purpose very well. Well packaged and fast shipping. I like the fact that it includes an integrated power lead so a separate one does not have to be run.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Soupman
Reviews.Content: you just buy something like this because you just need it at a certain size and you need it to work well.  It does..

Reviews.Title: Nice cable
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A nicely made cable that does exactly what it says it will. Nothing fancy, just a nicely made cable at a good price.Be aware that no BNC to RCA adapter comes with it, though some other cables do include one.

Reviews.Title: Great wire
Reviews.Author: Chickpeas1230
Reviews.Content: Wire works great however if you plan to use this cable as an extension be sure to buy a BNC female-female adapter as both sides of BNC are male.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: George a roosz
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Perfect midsized length.  I used this with an adapter to make an existing 60 ft cable an 85 ft cable.

Reviews.Title: nice wires
Reviews.Author: Naqi
Reviews.Content: these wires gives better picture quality than the factory made wires came with my camera system. Will order more in the future.

Reviews.Title: needed 9 more feet
Reviews.Author: Darlene M. Smith
Reviews.Content: the house I was installing the camera in was longer than I thought. this fit the bill working well and white coming the house made a neater job

Reviews.Title: Great extension or short distance cable for DVR cameras.
Reviews.Author: Jason Cox
Reviews.Content: Worked just like I needed it to. Kind of thin but that was expected at this price. Easy to run, camera signal was fine, connectors were fine.

Reviews.Title: A Decent Product
Reviews.Author: stugacz "stugacz"
Reviews.Content: This all in one video and power cable works well...so far.  I hope to be able to say I still like it after being in service for at least a year.

Reviews.Title: Doing it's job
Reviews.Author: Lisco
Reviews.Content: Got this for my father-in-law and it looks like it's doing its job. Make sure you get female connectors if you are trying to extend your wire because it doesn't come with one.

Reviews.Title: It works well but not the quality I expected
Reviews.Author: Casch "Chris"
Reviews.Content: Package arrived on time and in good condition. I was a bit disappointed by the very light wire used in the construction. They work and set up easy enough but I am concerned about how long they will last. Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Good for my needs!
Reviews.Author: L. Burdette
Reviews.Content: This is being used for an extension on a SWANN security system.  It is much thinner than the original cords and is being used inside the house.  I don't think I would trust it outside due to squirrels, bugs etc.  For inside, it's perfect.  It's a cord.  It does what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price.
Reviews.Author: AC
Reviews.Content: This item is described rather well.  The product is made from good quality. Will definitely do the job for a camera set up.

Reviews.Title: GW Security all in one BNC video and power cable
Reviews.Author: lucyb
Reviews.Content: This product replaced a defective cable that came with security system. It works great did not need 25 feet but for price could not beat it. It saved purchase of new monitor that my husband was convinced was the problem.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G Martin
Reviews.Content: These cables are exactly as described and they do everything they say they will.  My stock cables seemed to be more heavy duty than these, but since they are not in a high traffic area and secured to joists with wire staples, I don't think there will be any significant issues.

ProductInfo.Features:
25-Feet video/power cables in white
Ready Plug and Play
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 25 Feet Pre-made Siamese All-in-One BNC Video and Power Cable for CCTV Security Camera System
